ul.li: You can restrict the access to a page with the standard authentication mechanisms provided by your application server.
You can programmatically obtain the name of the currently logged in user, as well as other security related information.

div.p: If you have configured authentication in your application server, access to this application requires you to login through a login page. After you have successfully logged in, the application displays your username and other authentication information.
If you followed the installation instructions to the letter, the username and password are orbeonadmin/xforms.
